Web testing - Introduction

Web testing is the name given to software testing that focuses on web applications. Complete testing of a web-based system before going live can help address issues before the system is revealed to the public. [Wikipedia]

We are going to talk about web testing and how we can approach it.

Thinking at web testing as wikipedia defines we can do web testing using:

  • Unit testing
  • Functional testing
  • Usability testing
  • Client side performance testing

You can check out the slideshare presentation, the vimeo clip and the useful resources posts.
